successes.title: Arena Rex: Gladiator Combat in a Mythic Age
successes.description: Gladiator miniatures and an arena skirmish game in a world where history, myth, and legend intersect.

Pledges.description: Our thanks! Access to pledge rewards from the Marshalling Fields. Add the pledge amount of any desired rewards to your total. Free shipping within the United States.
“Lupa” - Kickstarter Exclusive Gladiator with art card. Free shipping within the United States.

“Ludus” - Any 3 gladiators from the Field of Mars, a resin activation token and stat card for each model, our mini rulebook, summer playtest PDFs, and 5 favor dice. Free shipping within the United States.

“Ludus Magnus” - Any 5 gladiators from the Field of Mars (1 gladiator may be switched for a selection from the Field of Jupiter), a resin activation token and stat card for each model, our mini rulebook, summer playtest PDFs, and 5 favor dice. Free shipping within the United States.

“Ludus Maximus” - Any 10 gladiators from the Field of Mars (2 gladiators may be switched for a selection from the Field of Jupiter), a resin activation token and stat card for each model, our mini rulebook, summer playtest PDFs, and 5 favor dice. Free shipping within the United States.

"Ludus Ultimus" - 15 selections from the Marshalling Fields (12 Gladiators may be selected from the Field of Mars, 2 Gladiators may be selected from the Field of Jupiter, 1 Gladiator/Beast may be selected from the Field of Titans), a resin activation token and stat card for each model, our mini rulebook, summer playtest PDFs,15 favor dice (including the 5 previously unlocked) A free (previously unlocked) Lupa Kickstarter exclusive miniature and 2 sets of faction dice (or a collector pack). Free shipping within the United States.
“Pictus” - Any Arena Rex miniature of your choice painted by our studio painter Benjamin Williams. Free shipping within the United States.

“Crassus” - One of every Arena Rex miniature unlocked through the Kickstarter campaign with stat cards, resin activation tokens, and 4” x 6” art cards. 20 favor dice, playtest PDFs, 2 rulebooks, and 10 of each faction die. 1 arena mat and 4 columns.
